snippet: A review of a deadly shooting that killed a federal security officer at Los Angeles International Airport in November faulted law enforcement agencies for communication lapses during the initial response, a report showed on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Report Faults Police Response to Los Angeles Airport Shooting
headline.main: Report Faults Police Response to Los Angeles Airport Shooting

lead_paragraph: A review of a deadly shooting that killed a federal security officer at Los Angeles International Airport in November faulted law enforcement agencies for communication lapses during the initial response, a report showed on Tuesday.
